Information.Name: image
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, container, tablecell, form, password, dialog_2, vdomclass, flexcontainer

Language.Sentence: The Image type produces an object displayed as an image. As a resource file here can be used image of any well-known type format: png, jpg, gif, bmp. The "Width" and "Height" attributes of the Image object change their values according to the size of the resource file.

Order of rendering the object on the page. Must be positive integer from 0 to 99. By default the value of hierarchy is 0, that means, that the object will be rendered in the order it is written in the XML-file of the VDOM application.

Position in visual hierarchy of objects. If you have several objects in one container situated on each other, the z-index indicates the order of their displaying. The larger z-index is, the upper the object lies.
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels.
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels.
Width of the object in pixels.
Height of the object in pixels.

The index number of switching the elements on pressing the Tab key. If the TabIndex is the same for all elements, they will be switched in the order they are written in the XML file of the application. If you want to switch the elements in a definite order, set the TabIndex attribute so that each next element's TabIndex was more then the previous one.
The image’s resource identifier. If both External URL and Value parameters are set, the prior will be the Value attribute.
The URL of the image located somewhere on the Internet.
The bubble help appearing when cursor points at the object.

from scripting.legacy.id import id2link1 class VDOM_image(VDOM_object): def get_css_style(self, style_name, style_value): if style_name == 'clear' and style_value == 'none': return "" if style_name == 'background-color' and style_value == '#': return "" if style_name == 'z-index' and style_value == '0': return "" if (style_name == "right" or style_name == "bottom") and (style_value == 'px'): return "" if style_value == "": return "" else: return "{}: {};".format(style_name, style_value) def render(self, contents=""): if self.value: link = id2link1(self.value) elif self.externalurl: link = self.externalurl elif self.base64stream: import base64 data = base64.b64decode(self.base64stream) res_id = application.resources.create_temporary(self.id, "data", data, "png", "data") link = "/%s.png"%res_id else: link = "" visible = u"display:none;" if self.visible == "0" else "" position = "static" if self.positioning1 == "0": position = "static" if self.positioning1 == "1": position = "absolute" if self.positioning1 == "2": position = "relative" if self.positioning1 == "3": position = "fixed" clear = "none" if self.float == 'both': clear = "both" self.float = "none" id = 'o_' + (self.id).replace('-', '_') styles = u"" style = u"" style_mixin = u"" title = iw = ih = "" if self.hint: title = u"""title="{hint}" """.format(hint = self.hint) if self.width.isdigit(): self.width = str(self.width) + "px" if self.height.isdigit(): self.height = str(self.height) + "px" if self.width == "": self.width = "0px" iw = u"""width="{width}" """.format(width = self.width) if self.height == "": self.height = "0px" ih = u"""height="{height}" """.format(height = self.height) result = "" if self.render_mode == "0": result = \ u""" """.format( id = id, name= self.name, visible = visible, link = link, width = iw, height = ih, tabindex = self.tabindex, classname = self.classname, title = title) if self.render_mode == "1": style_mixin = "\ #{id} {{ {backgroundimage} }}".format( id= id, backgroundimage= self.get_css_style('background-image', "url("+link+")") ) result = \ u"""
""".format( id = id, name= self.name, visible = visible, link = link, width = iw, height = ih, tabindex = self.tabindex, classname = self.classname, title = title) if self.render_mode == "2": result = \ u"""
""".format( id = id, name= self.name, visible = visible, link = link, width = iw, height = ih, tabindex = self.tabindex, classname = self.classname, title = title) style = u"\ #{id} {{ \ {height} \ {width} \ {zindex} \ {top} \ {left} \ {right} \ {bottom} \ {backgroundposition} \ {backgroundrepeat} \ {position} \ {float} \ {clear} \ {margin} \ {padding} \ {alignself} \ {flexgrow} \ {flexbasis} \ {order} \ {flexshrink} \ {backgroundcolor} }}".format( id=id, height= self.get_css_style('height', self.height), width= self.get_css_style('width', self.width), zindex= self.get_css_style('z-index', self.zindex), top= self.get_css_style('top', self.top + "px"), left= self.get_css_style('left', self.left + "px"), right= self.get_css_style('right', self.right + "px"), bottom= self.get_css_style('bottom', self.bottom + "px"), backgroundposition= self.get_css_style('background-position', self.backgroundposition), backgroundrepeat= self.get_css_style('background-repeat', self.backgroundrepeat), position= self.get_css_style('position', position), float= self.get_css_style('float', self.float), clear= self.get_css_style('clear', clear), margin= self.get_css_style('margin', self.margins), padding= self.get_css_style('padding', self.paddings), alignself= self.get_css_style('align-self', self.alignself), flexgrow= self.get_css_style('flex-grow', self.flexgrow), flexbasis= self.get_css_style('flex-basis', self.flexbasis), order= self.get_css_style('order', self.orderchild), flexshrink= self.get_css_style('flex-shrink', self.flexshrink), backgroundcolor= self.get_css_style('background-color', "#" + self.backgroundcolor)) style += style_mixin styles = styles.format(style) styles = styles.replace(" ", "").replace("\t","") result += styles return VDOM_object.render(self, contents=result) def is_correct_exturnal_url (self, url) : if url.lower().startswith("http://") or url.lower().startswith("https://"): return True return False def wysiwyg(self, contents=""): from scripting.legacy.wysiwyg import get_empty_wysiwyg_value if self.value: # show image from resources editable = u' editable="value" ' result = \ u""" """.format( id = self.id, zindex = self.zindex, hierarchy = self.hierarchy, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = ''.join(ch for ch in self.width if ch.isdigit()) or 50, height = ''.join(ch for ch in self.height if ch.isdigit()) or 50, image_x = 0, image_y = 0, image_id = self.value, editable = editable, name = self.name) elif self.externalurl: url = self.externalurl if not self.is_correct_exturnal_url(self.externalurl): url = u"http://empty.png" result = \ u""" """.format( id = self.id, visible = self.visible, zindex = self.zindex, hierarchy = self.hierarchy, order = self.order, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width or 50, height = self.height or 50, image_url = url, name = self.name) else: image_id = "e8115c4a-903a-a4c6-c0bc-08a336586d51" result = get_empty_wysiwyg_value(self, image_id) return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, contents=result) # def set_attr(app_id, object_id, param): def on_update(object, attributes): # o = application.objects.search(object_id) o = object # if "value" in param and not "width" in param and not "height" in param: if "value" in attributes and not "width" in attributes and not "height" in attributes: # attr = param["value"] attr = attributes["value"] # res_id = attr["value"] res_id = attributes["value"] ro = application.resources.get(res_id) if not ro: return "Resource not found" # get image resource, obtain width and height and set width and height of the object from PIL import Image import cStringIO s = cStringIO.StringIO() s.write(ro.get_data()) s.seek(0, 0) im = Image.open(s) width, height = im.size # set attributes # if o.attributes.width != width or o.attributes.height != height: # o.set_attributes({"width": width, "height": height}) if o.attributes["width"] != width or o.attributes["height"] != height: attributes.update(width=str(width) + "px", height=str(height) + "px") else: # if "width" in param and param["width"]["value"] != '' and int(param["width"]["value"]) > 2500: # o.set_attributes({"width": 2500}) if "width" in attributes and attributes["width"] != '' and not attributes["width"].isdigit(): attributes["width"] = ''.join(ch for ch in attributes["width"] if ch.isdigit()) or 50 if "width" in attributes and attributes["width"] != '' and int(attributes["width"]) > 2500: attributes["width"] = "2500" # if "height" in param and param["height"]["value"] != '' and int(param["height"]["value"]) > 2500: # o.set_attributes({"height": 2500}) if "height" in attributes and attributes["height"] != '' and not attributes["height"].isdigit(): attributes["height"] = ''.join(ch for ch in attributes["height"] if ch.isdigit()) or 50 if "height" in attributes and attributes["height"] != '' and int(attributes["height"]) > 2500: attributes["width"] = "2500" return ""
